TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

summary.span: Rappresenta il metodo che gestirà l'evento di un oggetto .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando si crea un delegato , si identifica il metodo che gestirà l'evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi in uso, aggiungere all'evento un'istanza del delegato.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato il caricamento asincrono di una stringa.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a string. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#38)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#38)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#38](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#38)] Il metodo seguente viene chiamato quando viene completato il caricamento.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#39)]
